name: Forgotten Wings: King of Demons Remake
name_original: Forgotten Wings: King of Demons Remake
description:
READ THE README IF YOU WANT THE GAME TO WORK.

Warning: This is only a demo, the full game has not been found, so only the demo has been translated. This is also not my work, only the translation is.

Forgotten Wings is a Lost remake of Live-A-Live's King of Demons chapter, with a new perspective adding into the frey with new characters, more plot, and more. It originally started development in 2009, and ended in 2015, due to the original creators no longer being able to work on it. All credit for the game goes to it's original creators, Nago Mie, Aster, and Vienne. Without these 3, I would not have made this in the first place. This demo takes place in the 36th episode of the series. This is also still a work in progress, as there's still much left to translate.
